text:
Donald Mcintosh "Don" Kendall (March 16, 1921 – September 19, 2020) was an American businessman and political adviser. He was CEO of Pepsi Cola and as CEO of PepsiCo from 1971 to 1986. Kendall was born in Sequim, Washington.
Kendall died on September 19, 2020 in Greenwich, Connecticut at the age of 99.
